title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.50 - Repairs of vehicles in berth space, other than emergency, prohibited; exception
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.50 - Repairs of vehicles in berth space, other than emergency, prohibited; exception

State Regulations

No repairs other than emergency repairs to highway
vehicles may be made in the berth space, except that the employees of a carrier
may make minor repairs in berth space exclusively licensed to such
carrier. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.50

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
